languages.text: Whenever an ally uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}, that ally gains {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to <u>(10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} + {uip|Resolve|5f3732268bf044fab685fcead7998a3c})</u>.

traits.locale_text: Whenever an ally uses a heroic act, that ally gains temporary wounds equal to <u>10% of their maximum wounds+(Leader's resolve)</u>.
Whenever an ally uses a heroic act, that ally gains temporary wounds equal to <u>(10% of their maximum wounds + Leader's resolve)</u>.

Whenever an ally uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}, that ally gains {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to <u>(10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} + {uip|Resolve|5f3732268bf044fab685fcead7998a3c})</u>.

traits.locale_text: Совершая героический акт, союзник получает <u>(10% от своего максимального запаса здоровья + решимость лидера)</u> временного здоровья.
Совершая героический акт, союзник получает <u>(10% от своего максимального запаса здоровья + решимость лидера)</u> временного здоровья.

Совершая {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g}, союзник получает <u>(10% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального запаса здоровья{/g} + {uip|Resolve|5f3732268bf044fab685fcead7998a3c} лидера)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}.

languages.text: 每当盟友发动{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}时，该盟友会获得临时{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}生命值{/g}，等同于<u>（该名盟友{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的10%+领袖的{uip|Resolve|5f3732268bf044fab685fcead7998a3c}）</u>。
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}, that ally gains {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to <u>(10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} + {uip|Resolve|5f3732268bf044fab685fcead7998a3c})</u>.

traits.locale_text: 每当盟友发动{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}时，该盟友会获得临时{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}生命值{/g}，等同于<u>（该名盟友{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的10%+领袖的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}）</u>。

languages.text: Cada vez que un aliado lleve a cabo un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g}, ese aliado gana tantas {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} como <u>(10 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} + {uip|Resolve|5f3732268bf044fab685fcead7998a3c} del líder)</u>.
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}, that ally gains {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to <u>(10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} + {uip|Resolve|5f3732268bf044fab685fcead7998a3c})</u>.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que un aliado lleve a cabo un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g}, ese aliado gana tantas {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} como <u>(10 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}brío{/g} del líder)</u>.

Cada vez que un aliado lleve a cabo un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g}, ese aliado gana tantas {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} como <u>(10 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} + {uip|Resolve|5f3732268bf044fab685fcead7998a3c} del líder)</u>.

languages.text: Wenn ein Verbündeter eine {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} einsetzt, erhält dieser Verbündete {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g} in Höhe von <u>(10 % seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} + {uip|Resolve|5f3732268bf044fab685fcead7998a3c} des Anführers)</u>.
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}, that ally gains {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to <u>(10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} + {uip|Resolve|5f3732268bf044fab685fcead7998a3c})</u>.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn ein Verbündeter eine {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} einsetzt, erhält dieser Verbündete {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g} in Höhe von <u>(10% seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} des Anführers)</u>.

Immer wenn ein Verbündeter eine {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} einsetzt, erhält dieser Verbündete {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g} in Höhe von <u>(10% seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} + {uip|Resolve|5f3732268bf044fab685fcead7998a3c} des Anführers)</u>.

languages.text: Chaque fois qu'un allié accomplit un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g}, il bénéficie de {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} égales à <u>(10 % de leurs {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} + {uip|Resolve|5f3732268bf044fab685fcead7998a3c} de l'officier)</u>.
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}, that ally gains {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to <u>(10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} + {uip|Resolve|5f3732268bf044fab685fcead7998a3c})</u>.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois qu'un allié accomplit un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g}, il bénéficie de {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} égales à <u>(10 % de leurs {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} du Leader)</u>.

Chaque fois qu'un allié accomplit un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g}, il bénéficie de {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} égales à <u>(10 % de leurs {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} + {uip|Resolve|5f3732268bf044fab685fcead7998a3c} du Leader)</u>.

languages.text: 味方が{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}を使用した時、その味方は<u>(その{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}傷の最大値{/g}の10% + {uip|Resolve|5f3732268bf044fab685fcead7998a3c})に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的な傷{/g}を得る。</u>
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}, that ally gains {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to <u>(10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} + {uip|Resolve|5f3732268bf044fab685fcead7998a3c})</u>.

traits.locale_text: 味方が{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}を使用した時、その味方は<u>(その{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}傷の最大値{/g}の10% + {uip|Resolve|5f3732268bf044fab685fcead7998a3c})に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的な傷{/g}を得る。</u>

味方が{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}を使用した時、その味方は<u>(その{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大体力{/g}の10% + リーダーの{uip|Resolve|5f3732268bf044fab685fcead7998a3c})に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}を得る。</u>

languages.text: Bir dost birim, {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}kahramanca eylem{/g} kullandığında <u>({g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanının %10'u + {uip|Resolve|5f3732268bf044fab685fcead7998a3c})</u> kadar {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanı kazanır.
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}, that ally gains {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to <u>(10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} + {uip|Resolve|5f3732268bf044fab685fcead7998a3c})</u>.
